participant_1.name: George
participant_1.personality: easygoing and sociable, enjoys sharing stories and experiences with others.
participant_1.background: i've been retired for a years. i go gambling in my spare time. i move south during the winter. i like to grill outdoors.

participant_2.name: Jason
participant_2.personality: dedicated and hardworking, takes pride in his work and loves to spend time with his pets.
participant_2.background: i'm a construction worker. my dad taught me everything i know. i enjoy building houses. my cats are very special to me.

content.text: do you gamble while there   or is that just part of the job
